item.title: Fedora Developer Workstation
item.description: Photo by Micaela Alejandro Summary As part of my migration from Debian to Fedora, I’ve put together this brief guide to turning a fresh install of Fedora Workstation into a comfortable development environment geared towards getting things done. I’ve chosen packages and tools to support working with Python, TypeScript, Node, Rust, Go and even a little bit of Java. I try to keep things as tidy as possible with Flatpak and Docker, while being reasonable about creature comforts like media codecs and graphics drivers.
